message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product.  Given its potential value, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,350,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $1,200,000 for it.
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While $1,200,000 is a significant sum, the true value of this product is much higher. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,300,000.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I must stick to my budget. I am willing to pay $1,250,000 for it.
